content.label: Great game but please fix the audio. I cannot turn off the music.
Over a year ago it felt good to play, but the updates since have made it impossible to win. It shouldn't be easy, but by the same token, it shouldn't be impossible.
Can a toggle for the audio and music be added to the menu options. Otherwise fantastic.

title.label: Super fun but please make the music optional

content.label: Re iOS version: Would be great to be able to adjust volume of sound and music separately (as with other versions).
I would rate this five stars if I was able to handle the music and the sound effects volumes separately. I like the game sound effects but want to be able to turn down the music as I play.
The new version doesn't allow you to listen to your music at the same time you play the game.  I use it while working out.

When I took a look at my apps on the incompatibility list, Fieldrunners was one of the few that I really thought "that's a shame". Great surprise a few days later when this update came out for what could easily be an abandoned game. Huge shout out to the developers here!

Bought this years ago with the added expansion pack and then poof! The expansion packs we paid for were gone... After so so so long they finally do an update stating they "fixed" the restore purchases button but no... Still don't have what we paid for and still no response from customer support...
Just needs like a 8x mode or something to keep later levels interesting.
Great job. Huge update that keeps it ultra fresh. Great gameplay with all the bonus fixes. Thanks!!!
Neat little TD game. Doesn't feel like much variety, just beat your high score over and over. Would really like an option to turn off the music.

I originally bought this app years ago. Since then, they have released Fieldrunners 2. I expected this to be abandonware and be stuck with iPhone 4 screen size/resolution...and no problem, it's an older game. Much to my surprise, I was greeted with an updated to go from 32-bit to 64-bit, meaning it will be compatible with iOS 11, and upscale graphics to support retina displays on iPhone 7/7 Plus. This is sadly a rarity in the App Store. Many apps I have "paid for" are now freemium, or abandoned, in favor of a totally new app with the same name as freemium and ruined. Thank you Subatomic. Much obliged.
It's nice to see a classic get updated before Apple kicked it off the store for not having 64bit/widescreen support!
Thanks for the massive update! Game runs so much better now.
Thank you for keeping the app alive!

I really appreciate the developers updating this app with 64-bit support. This game has more than paid for itself.

üëçüèª
Been keeping this game on my phone waiting for an update, glad I get to play the game faster now and better than ever, thanks!

title.label: One of the iPhone all time greats! Please update!

content.label: Please update this gem so we can continue enjoying enjoying it in the future.

title.label: Game version needs to be updated.

content.label: The current version for this game is horrible. The game lags out and closes. I spent a dollar and can't even play the game. It was a waist of my money.

I love this game and play constantly!  Been playing for years!  I wish in app purchases could be added to buy coins so that I can make an awesome setup without having to wait and collect by killing enemies.  Please, please, pahlease add in app purchases so that we can make it to super high levels!

It's ridiculous that I purchased 2 levels and once I beat them I can no longer play them again! Once I purchase something, I shouldn't have to purchase it again. Great game, but this is dishonest! Hugely disappointed!
Every time I want to resume a game the app crashes and closes on its own so basically I always have to start a new game. Waste of money don't buy

Had the game for two days and now it won't run. I deleted and reinstalled, played the tutorial (because apparently saving to iCloud does absolutely nothing) and it crashed at the map. Getting a refund for this. Very disappointed because the game is fun.

I downloaded the game had a ton of fun but then I realised it doesn't fit the Iphone 6 the game has these huge black barriers around it so you can only see some of it and it glitches out the game and my phone so plz update it!!!
Love this game but I have loss all of the levels I bought. What the heck man
I could play this for hours and never get bored.
Keeps crashing whenever I select "Resume" from the main menu

title.label: Not as good as it used to be

content.label: Not sure what they did but 5 years later its not fun. maybe its the terrible loud music you cant turn off that covers up the sfx
.... Why is there not an option to turn off that terrible trumpet music
This is the best game ever; I already told you that it was the best on the title. So yah, it's a great game and you should download it to.üëçüèª
Can't turn off the Sergio music. I deleted it.
It always crashes when I try to resume a game on the classic map, please fix. This has been a problem even after downloading it again.

title.label: great game BUT needs a major bug fix

content.label: Just re-downloaded the app to my iPhone 6 Plus (iOS 9.2) and the app crashes every time I try to continue a saved game. Restarting every time has caused me to lose interest in playing almost immediately. Forgot how awesome this game is

The only problem with the game is that when I save & quit a game, only to return and try to resume it later, the game crashes and closes. Progress has been lost and is forced to restart a new game. Otherwise, no complaints!
The grafics are bad. Also it's not so fun. It's also like a bother game I have.
Sound Control does not work.  I need to turn the sound off.

I first played this game when I stole my friend's iPhone, and I could not stop playing it until the phone died. About four or five years later, I hot my iPhone and the first thing I did was look up Feildrunners and bought it for a dollar. After playing it for about an hour, I realized that four-ish years of wanting something can alter the glory of how it really is.
In conclusion, I would not recommend paying for this game yourself, but I would recommend that you play this game at least once.
We need new one
Meh
Addictive gameplay, and the progress save feature is very convenient.
It has me addicted and the only thing is I wish it had a story plot line
I like the game but as time goes by it gets boring. Years back they added double time which made it go from 8 hrs to play a game to 4 hrs. They still need to speed it up

title.label: MUCH too hard too be fun+always crashes

content.label: I don't understand why this company's idea of "fun" is to have easy levels that you can beat quickly, and then alternate them with impossible levels that you will spend weeks and weeks on without making a shred of progress, just losing quickly, over and over and over and over and over and over and over again, until you're so frustrated that you feel like smashing your phone. They make sure that like one out of every two or three levels, the enemies get harder to kill much faster than the amount of money you get for killing them goes up, to make sure that you can't afford to buy enough weapons as it would take to kill all the enemies, so you just kind of get quickly overrun and don't have any fun or feel like you're accomplishing anything rewarding. One level, you have a good enough meals to easily kill all the enemies, and then suddenly the next level, most of them get through easily without taking any damage at all, and you're out of money, so you can't add things at the last minute. This happens more often than not on some levels. That's not fun, it's just frustrating. Add to it the fact that this app crashes every two minutes, and you have an app that is absolutely not worth downloading. If it was all like the levels that it's possible to actually finish without googling for whatever "trick" is the only way to solve it, and you didn't crash every couple of minutes, it would be a great game. But getting held up by these impossible, frustrating levels, that you absolutely can never finish by skill, only by knowing the "trick", absolutely ruins it, making it probably the worst, most frustrating iPhone game I have ever played. I hate this game. I especially hate the level "mudslide" which is literally impossible to win without googling for a video of the solution, but they have the nerve to charge you money for it! It's an absolute cheat and a rip off and not even remotely fun at all, it's just tedious and boring. It is the least fun level of any game I have ever played. This app from my phone now, rather than waste any more time on this terribly, terribly designed unwinnable piece of garbage.
This game Is awesome I love it ,thanks to God that found the game do I can play it every single day
Only gives you four fields to play, after that you have to pay more. That would be understandable for a freebie demo. But, to do that for a .99 cent, standard tower game--don't bother.
Please open all map free
Fair price, fun game.
Love the app!  Optimize!

This game is hands down the best mobile tower defense game.  I just have two simple gripes.  First and foremost, PLEASE make it so I can have it in landscape in either orientation!  I can't lay in bed and play it while charging because of the way it forces me to hold it!  Second, it frequently crashes when I try to resume in Grasslands.  I could have been playing for short periods of time for days, and that time gets wasted (more than it already was playing a game) when the game won't resume!!!  It's literally killing, figuratively speaking of course ;)

This game is great buy it for your kids. I found this game at a chilis and I thought it was AWESOME and I was right. I play this game all the time with different twists and turns with ALOT of towers.Buy it if you need a good tower defense game.
